## pureLoggingComponent() function

Creates a higher order component for lifecycle logging purposes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pureLoggingComponent<P, S>(aName: string, aDelegate: DelegateComponent<P, S>): ComponentClass<P, S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aName | <code>string</code> | name used for logging |
|  aDelegate | <code>DelegateComponent&lt;P, S&gt;</code> | delegate component |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ComponentClass<P, S>`

the component class
